text: (cool upbeat music)
- Hi, I'm Matt Bell

and I lead the Product
Research Team at Anthropic.
Anthropic is an AI safety and research lab
that builds reliable, interpretable,
and steerable AI systems.

We're excited that AWS
customers can now work

with our state-of-the-art
large language model, Claude,
through the Amazon Bedrock service.

Enterprises such as Notion,
Quora, Slack, and Zoom
are already innovating
in their respective fields using Claude.
Claude has several core AI skills.

First, with Claude, you can
process large amounts of text,

whether you're dealing with
documents, emails, FAQs,

chat transcripts, or
even entire code bases.

Claude's industry leading
100,000 token context window,

which is equivalent to around
200 pages of information,

lets you process
extensive amounts of data.
Claude can then edit, rewrite, summarize,

produce Q&A content,
generate code, and more.

In use cases such as
finance, healthcare, and law,

Claude is able to quickly
understand large documents
and offer actionable insights.

Additionally, Claude can
have natural conversations.
If you specify details on the role

you want Claude to assume in
dialogue, Claude will engage

in relevant and naturalistic
back and forth conversations.

You can use this for customer
support, Q&A, and more.
Claude can also automate workflows.
Claude can integrate

with existing corporate
knowledge bases, databases,

and specialized tools,
and easily integrate
with your existing workflows.

When you build with
Claude on Amazon Bedrock
you can privately and securely customize

your generative AI offering
using your organization's data,
and you can easily deploy your application
using the AWS tools you're familiar with.
We look forward to seeing what you build.
(cool upbeat music)
